name: CodeCompanion.nvim
system_promt: This project holds various dotfiles that I symlink into my home directory with GNU Stow this includes but is not limited to bashrc files, neovim config and and other tool configs.

groups.name: nvim config
groups.system_prompt: I've grouped my neovim config files into a group called "${group_name}". This configs control my neovim editor. The files are mostly lua configs.
